climatePledgeFriendly.details: Rainforest Alliance seal stands for more sustainable farming methods that help improve farmer livelihoods & mitigate climate change. The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: Contains 4 packs (160 sheets per pack) of Charmin Flushable Wipes
Each single pack has a re-sealable top
For best results, flush only one or two wipes at a time
Pair with Charmin toilet paper for an extra clean finish
Unique packaging and design, suitable to live anywhere in your bathroom or on the go
body.description: Try Charmin Flushable Wipes, with a re-sealable flip top to keep your wipes moist and your hiney Charmin-shiny. They’re flushable, plus the stylish packaging looks good wherever you decide to put it—or wherever you take it. That’s because this little soft pack is hugely portable, so you can take it with you, to enjoy the go, on the go! Pair with your favorite Charmin toilet paper for an extra clean finish because those who go with Charmin Flushable Wipes really enjoy the go!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Get That Fresh Feeling With Charmin Flushable Wipes They’re still the same Charmin Flushable Wipes you love except we gave them a little makeover. Enjoy the go and get that shower fresh clean feeling wherever you “go” with a resealable lid. Keep your eyes and bottoms peeled for the latest pack design.

Enjoy The Go With Charmin With Charmin Flushable Wipes you can always get that shower fresh feeling even without the shower. Our resealable lid and soft pack make Charmin Flushable Wipes the perfect travel buddy for your butt. Use Charmin Ultra Strong and Flushable Wipes together for a better clean*. *when paired with dry tissue vs. dry tissue alone.

We gave Charmin Flushable Wipes a little refresh so keep an eye out for our updated packs in store and online. We partner with organizations like the Arbor Day Foundation to fund forest replenishment in areas devastated by natural disasters like wildfires.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it. They tear like wet toilet paper.
reviews.reviewText: Not worth it. They tear like wet toilet paper, even when trying to get out of container. Spend 1 or 2 more dollars and get Dude Wipes which can be removed from container without tearing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done
reviews.reviewText: Got these on sale. The package is smaller than i thought it would be so it wasn’t as great of a deal as I thought I was getting. BUT it does what it needs to do. Kind of thin but you need that so you won’t clog the toilet. All in all I’d recommend BUT it is scented so only use it for your butt not your front ladies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are very good for the price. They have a pleasant scent and clean efficiently. But…it’s very difficult to get them to dispense one at a time even if you pull gently. Too many come out and I don’t like having to touch them to push them back in. Not sanitary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and Effective, A Bathroom Essential
reviews.reviewText: Charmin Flushable Wipes come in a pack of four, with each pack containing 40 wipes, summing up to a total of 160 wipes. These wipes have proven to be a great addition to my bathroom routine, providing a gentle yet effective cleaning experience. The texture of the wipes is soft and soothing, which is particularly appreciated on sensitive skin. They are also sturdy enough to provide a good clean without tearing, which is a common issue with other brands.One of the major selling points is their flushable feature. They break down after flushing, reducing the risk of clogging the pipes, which is a significant advantage over traditional wet wipes. The packaging is well-designed with a resealable tab that keeps the wipes moist and ready for use, even after being opened.The scent is mild and pleasant, not overpowering, which is a nice touch. The wipes are also free from harsh chemicals, making them a safe choice for all members of the family.However, while they are marketed as flushable, it's advisable to be cautious and not flush too many at once, especially in homes with older plumbing systems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Charmin products consistently deliver excellence. I utilize both their toilet paper and wipes, and my satisfaction with their offerings knows no bounds. Although the wipes are slightly smaller than typical ones, they perform exceptionally well, making them ideal for travel. Their softness and flushability contribute to a delightful user experience. I wholeheartedly endorse and recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A bit flimsy
reviews.reviewText: Not nearly the same quality as Cottonelle. A bit thin and small. Hard to pull only one out of the package too. Several tend to want to come out at once. Nice scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Theses are my favorite wipes to use they clean well and are soft and thick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like the shape
reviews.reviewText: They are very strong don’t tear and a good size
Suaves y con un agradable aroma

We just got these wipes and they were amazing to use. For the whole family (ages 4 to 53 in the household). I also have a severe allergy to aloe which makes it hard to find products that won’t give me a severe rash, cause my throat to close up, vomiting, etc... I am so happy with these!
Excelente producto me encanto la suavidad el aroma y que no se rompen !! Gracias y felicidades!!

reviews.reviewTitle: The best my butt has had
reviews.reviewText: These are the best butt wipes I've ever used. I've been using them for years and they're perfect. Barely a smell, cleans well, and doesn't burn when wiping like some do. Perfect.
El aroma es muy bueno, las toallitas con excelente humedad. Es un poco dificil sacar cada toallita en los primeros 4 o 5 usos pero después salen si problema, util para uso cotidiano. Resitentes
